name: Chunithm Amazon
overview: Chunithm Amazon is a rhythm game for Japanese arcades developed and published by SEGA, released in 2018. The game uses the traditional "falling notes" style of gameplay, as notes scroll down the screen. For each note, the player must hit the corresponding part of the "Ground Slider" controller. Tap notes require the note to simply be tapped, Hold notes require holding down the necessary part of the slider until the note ends, Slide notes are similar to Hold notes but the player must drag horizontally along the slider, and Flick notes require the player to slide across the part of the slider corresponding to the note.
